product.name: Winter Soft™ Sheet Set
product.description: They'll love staying cozy with luxurious softness and warmth.
product.long_description:
High-quality polyester microfiber is non-pilling for lasting warmth. Tested to ensure superior quality.

Set includes one oversized flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases. Twin Extra-Long set contains one pillowcase (Split King set contains two Twin Extra-Long fitted sheets).

Made in China.

Product Care:
  • Machine wash separately in cold, tumble dry low.
  • Do not bleach.
  • Do not use fabric softener or dryer sheets.
product.meta_description: Our high-quality polyester microfiber winter soft sheet set is non-pilling for lasting warmth and tested to ensure superior quality. Shop Now.

product.name: True Temp™ Sheet Set
product.description:
Made in China

2 year limited warranty

Product care instructions: Machine wash gentle cycle in cold water with mild detergent. Do not use chlorine bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or line dry.
product.long_description:
Our bedding with 37.5® technology continuously adapts to maintain your ideal microclimate, for comfortablesleep all night long. Blend of 76% cotton, 22% 37.5® polyester and 2% spandex. 320-thread-count sateen weave.

The benefits of 37.5® technology add up. With more layers, the longer you’ll sleep in your perfect comfort zone.

ExactFit™ and SmartFit™ designs keep your sheets snug and secure. Make your bed quickly by aligning the Logic™ Labels on all Sleep Number® bedding. Exclusive fabric design moves with you and retains its shape for a smooth fit across most mattress heights.

Set includes: One flat sheet, one fitted sheet and two pillowcases.
product.reference_description: Climate control for your best sleep.
product.meta_description: The benefits of 37.5® technology add up. With more layers, the longer you’ll sleep in your perfect comfort zone.
product.merchant_message: Climate control for your best sleep

financing_options.name: 12 Months with Payments/Deferred Interest
financing_options.disclaimer_message:
No Interest if Paid in Full within 12 Months **

On purchases with a Sleep Number® credit card. Interest will be charged to your account from the purchase date if the promotional purchase is not paid in full within 12 months. Minimum monthly payments required.

** Offer applies only to single-receipt qualifying purchases. No interest will be charged on the promo purchase if you pay the promo purchase amount in full within 12 months. If you do not, interest will be charged on the promo purchase from the purchase date. Depending on purchase amount, promotion length and payment allocation, the required minimum monthly payments may or may not pay off purchase by end of promotional period. Regular account terms apply to non-promotional purchases and, after promotion ends, to promotional balance. For new accounts: Purchase APR is 29.99%; Minimum Interest Charge is $2. Existing cardholders should see their credit card agreement for their applicable terms. Subject to credit approval.
